acf.title: Co-Chief Investment Officer
acf.bio_copy:
Justin Gmelich is Co-Chief Investment Officer and a member of the Office of the CIO. Together with other members of the Office of the CIO, he is responsible for partnering with the firm’s investment business heads across strategies and asset classes.

Prior to joining Millennium, Justin held several senior roles at King Street and Goldman Sachs. At King Street, Justin was a Partner and Global Head of Markets. He served as a member of the firm’s Management, Global Investment, Real Estate Investment and Risk Committees. Over the course of his more than 20 year career at Goldman Sachs, Justin was a Managing Director and Partner, and held several senior roles. He was most recently Global Chief Operating Officer for Fixed Income, Currencies and Commodities, and prior to that, Global Head of Credit Trading. Justin was also a member of several senior committees and councils at Goldman Sachs, including the Management Committee, Partnership Committee, Securities Division Executive Committee, firm-wide Risk Committee, GS Bank’s Management Committee and Global Recruiting Council. Prior to Goldman Sachs, Justin held positions at Chase and Salomon Brothers.

He is currently serving as Chair of the Villanova University Board of Trustees.

Justin received a BS in Finance from Villanova University, an MS in Accounting/Taxation from the University of Southern California and an MBA in Finance from Columbia University.
acf.subtitle: Office of the CIO
